nhc_headline: ...NOAA HURRICANE HUNTERS FIND BERYL EVEN STRONGER AS IT MOVES  QUICKLY ACROSS THE SOUTHEASTERN CARIBBEAN... ...HURRICANE WARNING ISSUED FOR JAMAICA...
summary:
...NOAA HURRICANE HUNTERS FIND BERYL EVEN STRONGER AS IT MOVES  QUICKLY ACROSS THE SOUTHEASTERN CARIBBEAN... ...HURRICANE WARNING ISSUED FOR JAMAICA...
 As of 8:00 PM AST Mon Jul 1
 the center of Beryl was located near 13.4, -64.0
 with movement WNW at 21 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 938 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 155 mph.
